alert.note: Alert for Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 29 at 8:26AM EDT until July 29 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A FLOOD WARNING IS NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...The Flood Warning includes the Kentucky counties of Johnson, Floyd, and Magoffin. * WHEN...The Flood Warning is in effect until 1130 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Some roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 823 AM EDT, flooding was ongoing. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Paintsville, Prestonsburg, Salyersville, Mason, Allen, Dobson, Swamp Branch, Leander, Bonanza, Riceville, Patrick, Brainard, Denver, Fitz, Ballot, Dotson, Collista, East Point, Ivyton and Conley.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
